control

Class LocationKeysManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.LocationKeysManager

  • public class LocationKeysManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that manages, using uniform probability distribution, the generation and manipulation of the location keys to assign to overlay's FPeers and contents.
    Since:
    March 9, 2015
    Author:
    Giuseppe Miraglia

    • Method Detail

      • tossCoin

        public static LocationKeysManager.Coin tossCoin(double biasFactor)
        Implements the operation of tossing of a biased coin, using a pseudo-random generator allocated with seed equal to the current system nano time.
        Notice that when biasFactor = 0.5, the tossing operation is equivalent to the toss of a balanced coin (equiprobability).
        Parameters:
        biasFactor - the biasing factor of the coin to toss, in [0.0, 1.0]
        Returns:
        HEAD or TAIL, based on the random generator result w.r.t. the biasFactor.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the biasFactor value is out of range [0.0, 1.0].

      • generateUniform

        public static double generateUniform(boolean useAsContent)
        Generates a pseudo-random, evenly distributed, unique, double-precision location key to assign to a FPeer or a content.
        Parameters:
        useAsContent - flag that specify if the generated location key must be a content location key
        Returns:
        the generated location key.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if, after MAX_ITERATION iterations, the method is unable to generate an unique location key.

      • getAvailableContentLocationKey

        public static double getAvailableContentLocationKey()
        Selects, in a pseudo-random fashion, a content location key from the set of already generated and available content location keys.
        Returns:
        a pseudo-random selected existing content location key, if it exists.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the set of already generate content location keys is empty.
